title: DIY Ultra-Powerful Natural Germicide JADAM Sulfur(JS) 10L for Gardeners. Homemade pesticide

subtasks: Weighing and measuring the required components (sulfur, sodium hydroxide, sea salt).
Preparing the water for the solution.
Adding the sulfur to a heat-resistant container.
Slowly adding sodium hydroxide while stirring to avoid boiling over.
Adding water to the mixture and stirring with a wooden stick or blender.
Ensuring all ingredients are thoroughly combined.
Using a ladle to remove any residue from the container walls.
Adding additional water if needed to reach the desired volume.
Transferring the solution to a heat-resistant bottle for storage.
